short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Loading a page? Waiting for an email? Bored, in general? Here are some classic games for you to play while waiting on a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gameeesssss!!!... The classic ones, a few new ones, and so many more coming. Play when you lose your internet, or when you're waiting for something to load, or when you're waiting for messages from your loved ones or when you're bored in general :)
